answers.author: Anne Marie Green
answers.text:
We utilize rear loaders for our bulk collection and use our own employees.  Some of the long time employees on the back of the trucks are Solid Waste Collectors and do not have CDL's, but all new employees are classified as Solid Waste Equipment Operators and they must either have or obtain their CDLs.

author: Stephanie McHenry
text:
Does your municipality utilize rear loaders for any of your collection processes?  If so, are the individuals on the back of the vehicle contracted employees or employees of your municipality?  Approximately, what percentage of your collection for refuse/recycle is curbside versus alley pickup?
If contracted out, do you set a minimum starting salary or let the market decide? If in-house, do you require them to have a CDL?
title: Contracted Employees
